createNewWindow.name: createNewWindow
createNewWindow.description: Create a new vscode window. it is not a workspace.

openWorkspaceFolder.name: openWorkspaceFolder
openWorkspaceFolder.description: open a workspace folder with an optional path to the folder. If provided, the folder will be opened as a workspace in Visual Studio Code. If not provided, a dialog will be displayed for the user to select a folder to open as a workspace. Note: If the user does not explicitly provide a path, you should not input a path.

folderPath.description: An optional path to a folder.
